subject: [YouTrack, Commented] Issue codio-6388: eduOrg plan
text:
Improvement was updated by Vasiliy Levykin in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 07:13.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6388 >codio-6388< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6388 > eduOrg plan Created by Joel Moss                                                                                  
When an org that is on the eduTrial plan agrees to pay for a license, we need to find that org in Zed and change the plan from eduTrial to a new eduOrg plan. This plan will not have any trial, but other limits of the eduTrial plan still apply. 
Additionally, we sometimes need to be able change the user limit for an eduOrg plan. In Zed, we should be able to find that org and set any user limit and apply it to that org. This should only be possible for orgs on the new eduOrg plan.      
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/user/joelmoss >Joel Moss:< https://bitbucket.org/codio/black-market/pull-requests/30/adds-customizesubscription-api-method/diff > https://bitbucket.org/codio/black-market/pull-requests/30/adds-customizesubscription-api-method/diff 
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6388#comment=85-4925 >View< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6388?replyTo=85-4925 > Reply

html:
Improvement was updated by Vasiliy Levykin in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 07:13.

codio-6388 eduOrg plan Created by Joel Moss
When an org that is on the eduTrial plan agrees to pay for a license, we need to find that org in Zed and change the plan from eduTrial to a new eduOrg plan. This plan will not have any trial, but other limits of the eduTrial plan still apply.

Additionally, we sometimes need to be able change the user limit for an eduOrg plan. In Zed, we should be able to find that org and set any user limit and apply it to that org. This should only be possible for orgs on the new eduOrg plan.
Joel Moss: https://bitbucket.org/codio/black-market/pull-requests/30/adds-customizesubscription-api-method/diff
